WorkItem.Summary: Invalid cell coordinate, when creating large document

Comments.Message: What writer were you planning to use for this file? Excel .xls files are limited to 256 columns; Excel .xlsx files are limited to 16,384 columns.

i was planning to use CSV  writer.

you could specify this info in the error message (ex.: maximum number of rows exceeded... or smth.), cause now it just looks like the coordinates where calculated wrong.
If you're planning on simply using CSV  for something this big, then you're better using PHP's built in fputCSV() function rather than a library like PHPExcel
